titles.title: MP206 Hallelujah, For The Lord Our God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, for the Lord our God
The Almighty reigns.
Hallelujah, for the Lord our God
The Almighty reigns.
Let us rejoice and be glad
And give the glory unto Him.
Hallelujah, for the Lord our God
The Almighty reigns.
